about_the_game: You must defend your castle from the onslaught of enemy armies. Choose your strategy, hire brave knights and legendary heroes, improve their stats. Fight a variety of opponents, from orcs and goblins to skeletons and necromancers. You must manage limited resources and make decisions in real time. Various upgrades for your towers, knights and heroes are waiting for you to help you in battle. Your goal is to last as long as possible and set a record for the time. The game has simple and convenient mouse control.

short_description: "King Of The Hill" is a top-down survival game where you have to defend your castle from enemies. Hire knights and heroes, improve them and your economy, fight different enemies and set records for time.
